<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.GlideVisualizationFrameworkMigrator</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>GlideVisualizationFrameworkMigrator</name> <script><![CDATA[var GlideVisualizationFrameworkMigrator = Class.create(); GlideVisualizationFrameworkMigrator.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
doMigration: function() { gs.info("PAR_MIG: Triggering migration from Script Includes for par visualization components"); var migrator = new SNC.VisualizationFrameworkMigrator(); migrator.doMigration(); },
